alert.note: Alert for Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 11:32PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of north central Lake and central Flathead Counties through 100 AM MDT... At 1232 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking intense snow showers along a line extending from 13 miles north of Swan Lake to 8 miles southwest of Bigfork. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result in dangerous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Woods Bay, Bigfork and Lakeside. This includes the following highways... Highway 83 between mile markers 75 and 85. Highway 93 N between mile markers 94 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Flathead, Mission Valleys; Kootenai, Cabinet Region; West Glacier Region
